name: Cartography [LDJAM38]
description:
Cartography is a first person puzzle (plus walking simulator) game, which is in a prototype-ish state, but there is an ending.

CONTROLS:
WASD, SPACE AND MOUSE
I : INVERT MOUSE
F : FULLSCREEN
R : RESTART
ESC : QUIT

It's the result of my first Ludum Dare Jam participation (made in 72 hours). :D
LDJAM38 Theme: "A Small World".
See also https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/cartography
